post:
As the Club Uptime beta nears it's end, with it's expected final launch date being on January 20th 2012, we need our final round of testing to be completed. We've managed to work out every last bug reported to us thus far, but we want to be absolutely certain that we're releasing a product that people will utilize that's easy to use, intuitive, and "just works".

If you're not a tester already, please visit https://my.clubuptime.com/register to sign up and give it a shot.

Are you already a tester? What are your ideas for the system?

Beta testers will be eligible for a 50% off discount for the first six months of service provided they are in the US, UK, or Canada, so join now to help secure your discount while helping us ensure our product is stable and functional!
